title: Unnecessary Leaver Buster
body: I have received multiple leaver buster warnings as well as que-timer penalties over the past week or so due to some kind of LoL connection problems. I do have small ping spikes on my internet very infrequently, which last for maybe 2-5 seconds, which causes my game to start 'Reconnecting" which can last sometimes 5 minutes while it attempts to 'reconnect'. This doesn't make sense to me because I can browse YouTube, play music online, and browse websites while League is 'reconnecting', so I definitely have a solid connection. Even if nothing can be done about these unnecessary punishments, I would just like further information as to how this works, and what I might be able to do to prevent further problems with my account. Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection might be unstable, and causing you to lose comms with our game server.  Though your internet might be able to work fine elsewhere and play videos, you can still have issues reaching specific services.  Even though your leaving is not intentional, the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system will treat everyone equally because leaving still causes others a negative experience.

For this specific issue, my suggestion would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot towards a fix.  Test it out in a custom game though to prevent further penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
